faqData.question: How does ERP help improve customer service in telecom?
faqData.answer: ERP solutions provide a centralized view of customer data, tickets and service history. This helps support teams to respond faster, resolve issues efficiently and maintain stronger relationships with customers.

faqData.question: Can an ERP handle telecom-specific billing and subscriptions?
faqData.answer: Yes. Modern ERP systems are designed to manage multiple billing models including prepaid, postpaid and hybrid plans. They offer precise control over rates, discounts and invoicing, ensuring accurate revenue tracking.

faqData.question: Is it possible to integrate existing telecom tools with an ERP system?
faqData.answer: Most telecom-focused ERP offer integration capabilities through APIs and connectors. This allows easy communication between your existing CRM, OSS/BSS systems and financial tools without disrupting operations.
